meanings.definition: The quality of being elastic or bouncy.
meanings.sent1: The trampoline's springiness delighted the children at the park.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band's springiness made it perfect for holding things together.
meanings.sent3: The mattress's unexpected springiness gave Grandma a surprise when she sat down.
meanings.sent4: The springiness of the diving board launched the swimmer high into the air.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's playful springiness brought joy to everyone around.

meanings.definition: The ability to return to an original shape after being stretched or compressed.
meanings.sent1: The sponge's springiness allowed it to quickly regain its shape after being squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The springiness of the balloon made it easy to blow up again after deflating.
meanings.sent3: The bread dough's surprising springiness made it bounce back when poked.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's shoes had excellent springiness, helping him run faster.
meanings.sent5: The rubber ball's springiness made it bounce higher than the others.
